DOC.brief_summary: There is a pressing need to find effective strategies for the prevention of contrast induced nephropathy in patients with advanced renal dysfunction. The current study was designed to assess the efficacy of a new protocol for preventing contrast induced nephropathy in patients with advanced renal dysfunction undergoing coronary interventions
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Contrast Induced Nephropathy in Patients With Advanced Renal Dysfunction Undergoing Coronary Interventions
